name: Scratchnapped 2 - v0.14
description:
Experimenting with ideas for a Scratchnapped spin-off game where you take the role of a lost Scratchling trying to find his way home.

This level is unfinished, but that's because it's just a test and I'm adding new things to the engine still :)

Please let me know if you have any lag or control issues? Lots of the concepts in here are experimental and I need your feedback as to whether this is going to work on those with less powerful computers.

Features:

* Robust Scrolling Platform detection

* Gravity, Velocity, Friction

* Slope detection - steep slopes slow movement

* Wall Jumping

* Costume based levels

* Animated player

* Moving / Rotating platforms (bit tricky to work with but can be just deleted)

* Simple parallax background scrolling

* Player death when touching 'hurt' sprites

* Way points

* Enemies
